recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.procedure: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente. In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated Pecorino cheese, and black pepper. In a frying pan, saut√© pancetta and garlic until crispy. Drain the spaghetti and combine it with the egg and cheese mixture. Mix in the pancetta and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.procedure: Cook fettuccine pasta until al dente, then drain. Season chicken with salt and white pepper, then cook in a pan until done. In a separate pan, combine cream, grated Parmesan, and minced garlic. Simmer until sauce thickens, then add cooked chicken. Serve the chicken Alfredo over the cooked fettuccine pasta.
